category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_use_legacy_template_filter
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether to use the legacy Type and Group based Template Filter or the new Condition based Template Filter. Valid Values: * true: Use the legacy Type and Group based Template Filter. * false: Use the new Condition based Template Filter. This is the default value.
